rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in your bedroom. You can see the bathroom down the hallway.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Time to freshen up! Long day ahead!

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: Who actually goes to the attic? Are you a horror movie character?

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Something's off. The kitchen is eerily quiet. Anyway, time to eat!

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: As you walk into your living room, you see a gun and a bloodstain on the ground. Hmm, strange.

rooms.name: Basement
rooms.description: You hear muffled screaming from the basement. As you round the stairs, you die! Game over!
